critique: This document is an amendment to an existing executive order regarding travel expenses for veterans. It increases the mileage allowance for veterans traveling to Veterans' Administration facilities. This appears to be a minor administrative change with little to no impact on the axes of political bias. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, executive power shift, federalism implications, security vs. liberty concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, all scores should be close to neutral.
